# Promoting health in aging populations

 

## Substantive expertise

-   Concurrent progression of complex chronic conditions
    -   Dementia and cognitive impairment
    -   Multimorbidity
    -   Mobility limitations
-   Identification of modifiable risk/protective factors
    -   Comorbid chronic conditions
    -   Dietary intake
    -   Food insecurity
-   Cohort trends in population health

 

## Methodological expertise

-   Longitudinal modeling
    -   Gaussian, logit, Poisson, ZIP/ZINB distributions
    -   Growth modeling (latent and multilevel approaches)
    -   Change scores, first-order autoregression
    -   Survival analysis
-   Classification models
    -   Latent class analysis
-   Analysis of dynamic health data
    -   Household clustered national probability samples
    -   Non-random missing data (mortality selection)
-   Toolkit
    -   SAS (e.g., PROC SURVEYREG, PROC GLIMMIX, arrays/macros)
    -   R (e.g., Tidyverse, ggplot2, RSiena)
    -   Mplus
